text: The Uzbekistan national futsal team represents Uzbekistan in international futsal and they been to the FIFA Futsal World Cup and the AFC Futsal Championship. They are the hosts of the 2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup marking the first time Uzbekistan hosting a major FIFA tournament. ==Competitive record== ===Summary=== Event Gold Silver Bronze Total AFC Futsal
